item.title: OpenSSH related stuff
item.description: Create a ed25519 SSH key ECC: Elliptic Curve Cryptography is a family of algorithms (ECDSA, ed25519) Curve25519: name of the elliptic curve Ed25519: Name of the signature algorithm $ ssh-keygen -a 100 -t ed25519 -b 521 -f ~/.ssh/id_ed25519.barbot.org -C "julien@barbot.org" You can look at explainshell.com to understand each parameters. Use this key for specific hosts: $ cat .ssh/config Host github.com IdentityFile ~/.
